author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

PFCluster.cc had a templated anonymous function using the vdt butthat function was never called.

#### PR validation:

I added the line `static_assert(sizeof(Scalar)==0);` to the function in question and the assert never happened. The only way that occurs is if the templated function was never actually instantiated.
title: Removed vdt dependency on DataFormats/ParticleFlowReco
